message: When I return to the field, Ren is still standing there, head lowered, eyes hidden.
When Ren lifts his head and I see his face, a spike of terror shoots through me.
His eyes are bloodshot, his teeth bared. He licks his lips and growls with naked malice.
I back away. But Ren closes the distance, one step at a time.
This isn't Ren. Did I... break him?
Ren pounces. I can't get away!
